asset_tools.label: Assets & Tools
asset_tools.guidance: Does this change introduce new IT assets, software, hardware or tools? Does it modify existing assets? Does it require updating the asset inventory?

information_data.label: Information & Data
information_data.guidance: Are new types of data involved? Does it change the classification of existing data? Does it impact backups, retention or data transfers?

access_privileges.label: Access & Privileges
access_privileges.guidance: Does it require new access or permissions? Does it modify existing roles? Does it impact authentication, authorization or segregation of duties?

process_controls.label: Processes & Controls
process_controls.guidance: Does it modify existing operational processes? Does it require new controls? Does it impact change management, incident response or continuity procedures?

risk_impact.label: Risk & Impact
risk_impact.guidance: Does it introduce new risks? Does it modify the existing risk profile? Does it require updating the risk assessment?

policies_docs.label: Policies & Documentation
policies_docs.guidance: Does it require updating policies, procedures or guidelines? Does it impact ISMS documentation? Does it need new documentation?

people_awareness.label: People & Awareness
people_awareness.guidance: Does it require training? Does it impact roles and responsibilities? Does it need communication or skills update?
